snippet.title: Choose Cthulhu Files: The Call of Cthulhu Trailer
snippet.description:
👉 Add it to your Steam wishlist: https://wgl.ink/0a69j

Ancient beings as old as the world itself are beginning to awaken from their timeless slumber, while their followers conspire for their return. Your decisions will seal humanity’s fate. Will you preserve your sanity, or be consumed by madness as you uncover the darkest secrets?

Choose Cthulhu Files: The Call of Cthulhu is an interactive adventure blending visual novel elements with exploration mechanics in the style of a graphic adventure, immersing players in a world of cosmic horror and mystery. Inspired by the works of H.P. Lovecraft and the popular Choose Cthulhu gamebook series.
